channel.title: Our-companies on CommerceV3
channel.description: Recent content in Our-companies on CommerceV3

item.title: About Us
item.description:
When you have a problem, you will get a knowledgeable person on the phone who will fix your issues the first time.

Like the platform, the entire company is web-based, meaning everyone works from a space of their own choosing. It’s good for the environment and it helps us get more done, faster! We are a company of innovators and technology rockstars.

Leadership Team

Blake Ellis

Founding Partner & Chief Executive Officer

Blake Ellis often gets tagged as a “serial entrepreneur”, having been involved in a number of web-based start-ups. Most of his efforts fail spectacularly, but the ones that survive seem to do very well. In addition to CommerceV3, the successes include Rails Machine, Smack Dab Studios, ResEngine, and Timberline Interactive.

Blake has won numerous technology awards for CommerceV3 and Rails Machine, including the CBETA Innovation Award and graduation from the Advanced Technology Development Center at Georgia Tech.

Nathan Focht

Founding Partner & President

Nathan is the heart and soul of CommerceV3, relentlessly driving the platform from its humble beginnings to ever greater heights. He is quick to answer his cell phone, even when things are going wrong, and he’s just as quick to give you a straight and honest answer, even if you were wanting a bit of fluff.

More catalog merchant than software developer, Nathan breaks new ground by reinventing tried and true retail techniques to sell more online. He re-envisioned “square inch analysis,” a staple of print catalogs, and brought it into the 21st century for application to online sales. He routinely devises new ways of offering customer segmentation and promo codes, something you will love and hate if you ever have the opportunity to sift through the thousands of permutations available in CV3.

Nathan has won numerous awards for CommerceV3 and was the driving force behind the 2009 acquisition of Timberline Interactive.

item.title: Careers
item.description:
We come together for user group conferences, on-site work sessions, camping trips and the occasional paintball massacre. We also interact daily via video conferences, conference calls and instant messaging. It’s a “do-it-yourself” culture that’s not for everyone, but if you are a self-starter and proficient with web-based communication tools, it could be for you!

We currently are actively recruiting for the following positions:

  • Business Development Representative
  • Customer Support Specialist
  • Online Marketing Specialist
  • Sales Representative

Send your application, and why you think you’d be a great addition to our team to: jobs@commercev3.com.

item.title: Contact Us
item.description:
Schedule a Demo

The best way to evaluate CV3 is to take it for a test drive. Contact our sales team at 888-544-2211 or sales@commercev3.com to schedule a great time for a demo.

Get Support

We’re alway here when you need help. Contact our support team at 888-544-2211 or support@commercev3.com. Include all the details you can so we can expedite our response.

Mailing Address

13045 MOUNTAIN TRAIL
CLERMONT, FL 34715
PHONE: (888) 544-2211
FAX: (866) 562-9492

Become a Partner

CommerceV3 is always looking for new partners that compliment our products and services.  If you offer something that you think might be beneficial to a CV3 client or would like to be a Reseller, we would love to talk.  We are currently looking for partners in the following areas:

  • 3rd Party Software Providers
  • Service Providers
  • Web Designers & Developers
  • Marketing Services
  • Value Added Resellers

Contact us for more information about becoming a partner.
